about_the_game:
Story:

You play as a young guy who is dating a girl from his institute. They genuinely love each other, but you have difficulty having sex, which causes tension in the relationship. In desperation, you decide to ask your mother for advice. One evening, while watching a movie together, you muster up the courage to ask your mother for advice on having sex. At first she refuses, laughing at your request, but then decides to help you. This leads you and your mother to unexpected consequences.

Key Features:.

Deep Narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Lusty Mother

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lusty Mother is a visual novel for adult audiences. You take on the role of a young boy who learns how to have sex under the guidance of his mother. They practice in secret from the unsuspecting father, as the mother wants her son to become a skilled lover.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
